php -r "function random_str(\$length, \$keyspace = '0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ!#$%&()*+,-./:;<=>?@{|}~') { \$pieces = []; \$max = mb_strlen(\$keyspace, '8bit') - 1; for (\$i = 0; \$i < \$length; ++\$i) { \$pieces []= \$keyspace[random_int(0, \$max)]; } return implode('', \$pieces); } \$fp = fopen('wp-config.php', 'r'); \$buffer = fread(\$fp, 120000); fclose(\$fp); \$lines = explode('
